title: Accrue 100,000 dSolar
description: Set new standards in solar energy production! To complete this quest, have at least 100,000 dSolar in your inventory.

dialogue.text: You've come a long way, surpassing all the benchmarks I've set for you. Now, we're aiming for the stars! Your next challenge is to reach 100,000 dSolar. It's a monumental task, but you've shown you have what it takes to reach such heights!

Astounding! You've hit a new milestone in solar energy generation! I'm genuinely impressed. Remember, every dSolar represents a step toward a more sustainable future. I'll be back with an even bigger challenge. Keep lighting the way!
